extendedInfo.description: The survival of the Angry Birds is at stake. Dish out revenge on the greedy pigs who stole their eggs. Use the unique powers of each bird to destroy the pigsâ defenses. Angry Birds features challenging physics-based gameplay and hours of replay value. Each level requires logic, skill, and force to solve.If you get stuck in the game, you can purchase the Mighty Eagle! Mighty Eagle is a one-time in-app purchase in Angry Birds that gives unlimited use. This phenomenal creature will soar from the skies to wreak havoc and smash the pesky pigs into oblivion. Thereâs just one catch: you can only use the aid of Mighty Eagle to pass a level once per hour. Mighty Eagle also includes all new gameplay goals and achievements!In addition to the Mighty Eagle, Angry Birds now has power-ups! Boost your birdsâ abilities and three-star levels to unlock secret content! Angry Birds now has the following amazing power-ups: Sling Scope for laser targeting, King Sling for maximum flinging power, Super Seeds to supersize your birds, and Birdquake to shake pigsâ defenses to the ground!What is new in version 3.2.0:The #1 app of all time gets a fun new update! You may be an expert pig popper, but how will you cope with a moving target? One bird stands between the egg and the advancing pig army in the all-new Redâs Mighty Feathers episode. The fearless Red Bird faces wave after wave of Bad Piggies in their crazy contraptions. But wait! He now has some magic feathers from the Mighty Eagle himself â giving Red incredible new powers as he darts toward those pesky pigs at incredible speed!Fun new gameplay â the Egg Defender mode gives Red special powers to attack the advancing pigs!15 new levels â the latest Redâs Mighty Feathers episode brings fresh new challenges!72 crazy pig contraptions â wave after wave of Bad Piggies edging closer in their wacky machines!Rovio Account for Android â pick up your game where you left off across multiple devices!Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacyThis free version of Angry Birds contains third party advertisements. Please see our privacy policy for additional information.This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply.Important Message for ParentsThis game may include:- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.

reviews.title: Excellent!!
reviews.comment: What can I say, one of the best games on Android platform. Complete entertainer and keeps you glued. Works great on Motorola Atrix 2. Great job and keep it up!!

reviews.title: Addicting and absolutely awsome!
reviews.comment: Such an amazing game! One of the best...ever! Keep it up :)

reviews.title: Constant Crashing
reviews.comment: Every time an ad pops up it resets the game. Its like this for all the other Angry Birds games too.

reviews.title: No more daily bonus powerups?!?
reviews.comment: I LOVE this game. I\'ve been playing for quite some time now. To the point of trying to get 3 stars on all levels. I can\'t afford to buy powerups being a single mom with limited $. Some levels require a powerup to get a perfect score. Please you guys,  will you bring it back in the next update? Pretty please? \342\231\245 I\'ll  give 5\342\230\205\'s if you do!!

reviews.title: Enjoy
reviews.comment: Fun game..enjoyable..update new level..good
reviews.author: Farizat Mazlan

reviews.title: Ad-free?
reviews.comment: I paid for the ad-free version of the game, but ads keep popping up, with an option to pay, again, to be ad-free. Fix this!

reviews.title: Horrible adds
reviews.comment: Adds are everywhere. Video popups, always adds coming across the top of screen and there is a popup to register between every stage and replay.

reviews.title: cool
reviews.comment: very cool and I love it

reviews.title: Needs aim line.

reviews.comment: Here I am. Playing my game and all of a sudden, they demoted me.. I was on poached eggs 3-16 now I\'m back on 2-16... WTFFF.. FIX ITTT!!!!

reviews.title: Great!

reviews.comment: It seems rovio has become greedy aswell.....whatever happened to the daily powerups? trying to squeeze out more money from us rovio? Disappointing this used to be 5 stars with no video ads...

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: The game is absolutely legendary its addictive it\'s like a page turner in a book but it\'s not I afore all angry birds and you will to it\'s coming from the bottom of my heart its no lie
